text: How should I clean and care for my hijab?
botText:
You should hand wash and air dry our products for best results. If you would like to machine wash, wash on warm, delicate using a gentle detergent and tumble dry for best results. Be sure to wash with other scarves/hijabs and very similar colours ONLY!

Use a stain remover carefully following the instructions on the product label.

Unfortunately, the toughest stains may not come out. Treat our products with care.
